title: The Rain in Spain
text:
Matt & Ann go to Espanya and Catalunya, and get lost.

July and August 2025 we travel to Spain for the World Rogaining Championships and the World Masters Orienteering Championships. In between weâ€™ve decided to live and work from Girona, Catalunya for 6 weeks and experience all the things.
